pullrequest.title: Generalized Optitrack for different project files

content.raw: I built this code on beefy, made some updates to revert a bad merge, and ran it. The axes are now messed up in a major way. I'm going to decline this pull request and focus on other handsim issues for now. If anyone feels like checking my math, please feel free.
content.html: I built this code on beefy, made some updates to revert a bad merge, and ran it. The axes are now messed up in a major way. I'm going to decline this pull request and focus on other handsim issues for now. If anyone feels like checking my math, please feel free.
